Bill to allow hair salons to provide beverages surprises industry https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bill-to-allow-hair-salons-to-provide-beverages-surprises-industry/ESQKG4Q43ZCT3HRRONHO3BPVAI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bill-to-allow-hair-salons-to-provide-beverages-surprises-industry/ESQKG4Q43ZCT3HRRONHO3BPVAI/ A new bill would make it legal to serve drinks at hair salons. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 08:04:48 +0000 A 2008 regulation made it illegal to serve drinks at hair salons. Photo / 123RF
Nelson man Ryan Mills chased bus after claiming it damaged his parked car https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-man-ryan-mills-chased-bus-after-claiming-it-damaging-his-parked-car/NDRGIZNR2NGCZFXKMG7UND5PPQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-man-ryan-mills-chased-bus-after-claiming-it-damaging-his-parked-car/NDRGIZNR2NGCZFXKMG7UND5PPQ/ Tracy NealBus driven in loops through suburban streets to try to shake Ryan Mills off the chase. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 07:46:36 +0000 Passengers on a tour bus were left shaken after the driver "looped" through suburban streets to shake off another driver in pursuit. Photo / 123RF
Elevated levels of arsenic detected in Waikato River affect Auckland, Waikato water supplies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elevated-levels-of-arsenic-Detected-in-waikato-river-affecting-auckland-and-waikato-water-supplies/FLLHFHG6F5HSPCHY66RF7WNCMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/elevated-levels-of-arsenic-Detected-in-waikato-river-affecting-auckland-and-waikato-water-supplies/FLLHFHG6F5HSPCHY66RF7WNCMU/ Benjamin PlummerArsenic is a substance found in rock that can be deadly if consumed in large amounts. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 07:03:30 +0000 Elevated readings of arsenic have been recorded in the Waikato River. Photo / Doug Sherring

Christopher Tean Salt guilty of murdering Tofi Matagi in Mt Roskill, Auckland bar attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/christopher-tean-salt-guilty-of-murdering-tofi-matagi-in-mt-roskill-auckland-bar-attack/NC64YFDCVNFCZCM3QEU6YAFXKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/christopher-tean-salt-guilty-of-murdering-tofi-matagi-in-mt-roskill-auckland-bar-attack/NC64YFDCVNFCZCM3QEU6YAFXKM/ Craig KapitanChris Salt claimed his victim was a deportee who had a gun. He was wrong. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:52:18 +0000 A CCTV still from Richardson’s Bar and Restaurant in Mt Roskill, Auckland, shows Christopher Salt, left, and Tofimua Matagi playing darts together shorly before Salt fatally assaulted him. The footage has been played for jurors at Salt's High Court at Auckland murder trial. Photo / Supplied
Olivia Podmore coronial inquiry: Olympian requested health chats about teen abortion before death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/olivia-podmore-coronial-inquiry-olympian-requested-health-chats-about-teen-abortion-before-death/J4QPYHQMNBCC3HY5V2QVXBXOBE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/olivia-podmore-coronial-inquiry-olympian-requested-health-chats-about-teen-abortion-before-death/J4QPYHQMNBCC3HY5V2QVXBXOBE/ Tom DillaneA three-week inquest in Hamilton is investigating the Olympian's death in 2021 aged 24. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:18:39 +0000 Olivia Podmore died in a suspected suicide the day after the Tokyo Olympics ended, August 9, 2021. Photo / Supplied
Menopausal women ‘blindsided’ as Pharmac changes hormone replacement patch supplier https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/menopausal-women-blindside-as-pharmac-changes-hormone-replacement-patch-supplier/HFNTVREE6NEENIYWT7KJAMAITY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/menopausal-women-blindside-as-pharmac-changes-hormone-replacement-patch-supplier/HFNTVREE6NEENIYWT7KJAMAITY/ Pharmac plans to switch to the Mylan brand of estradiol transdermal patches next year. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:14:15 +0000 Some menopausal women feel blindsided by a decision to switch the supplier of hormone replacement patches, a doctor says. Photo / 123rf
Black Power’s Michael Hutchinson first in New Plymouth to appear on gang insignia ban charge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/black-powers-michael-hutchinson-first-in-new-plymouth-to-appear-on-gang-insignia-ban-charge/HOIO4ZFFYZBUZNNPDWLSQ2Y6YU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/black-powers-michael-hutchinson-first-in-new-plymouth-to-appear-on-gang-insignia-ban-charge/HOIO4ZFFYZBUZNNPDWLSQ2Y6YU/ Tara ShaskeyPeople wearing insignia from at least six different gangs are currently before the courts. Warkworth School’s musical bell system sparks stoush https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warkworth-schools-musical-bell-system-sparks-stoush/NL56JAOW4BH3RBX3DPEMSBDRJY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/warkworth-schools-musical-bell-system-sparks-stoush/NL56JAOW4BH3RBX3DPEMSBDRJY/ The principal says students' learning, attendance and behaviour have improved. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Te Kura o Puhinui Warkworth School is defending its use of "music-based" school bells, which has sparked backlash in the community for causing "noise pollution". Photo / Supplied
Fatal Waikato bus crash: State Highway 1 blocked, one dead as emergency services, helicopters respond https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/state-highway-1-crash-in-waikato-emergency-services-responding/G35ESX5VTZDXHIITQAXPEMJZVI/ Seven ambulances and five helicopters responded. Wed, 27 Nov 2024 05:56:00 +0000 Both Auckland Westpac Rescue Helicopters were tasked to transport patients to Auckland City Hospital. Westpac 2 helicopter transported a female patient in her teens in a serious condition. Westpac Helicopter 3 transported a male patient in his 40s in a serious condition. Photo / Auckland Rescue Helicopter Trust
Prime Minister Christopher Luxon claims he’d be comfortable living next to new radioactive waste facility https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-claims-hed-be-comfortable-living-next-to-new-radioactive-waste-facility/XPMLT3EMXJFNBIFLB4WRIOPLQE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-claims-hed-be-comfortable-living-next-to-new-radioactive-waste-facility/XPMLT3EMXJFNBIFLB4WRIOPLQE/ Michael MorrahA facility for storing all of the country's radioactive waste has been built in Manawatū.
